Zahi Hawass pointed out that Egypt recognised and appreciated the care and effort undertaken by the German government to preserve and display the painted limestone bust of Queen Nefertiti. Inspired by the excellent relations between our two countries, the government of Egypt is confident that the German authorities will assist in facilitating its return, he said, adding that the government and people of Egypt were eager that this unique treasure be returned to the possession of its rightful owners, the Egyptian people.
